mapper.select: select id, name, base_rate as baseRate, activity_rate as activityRate from loan where id = ${id}
select loan.id, loan.name from loan join loan_repay where loan.id = loan_repay.loan_id and loan_repay.id = #{loanRepayId}
select login_name from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' and transfer_status != 'SUCCESS'

select (select mobile from user where user.login_name = invest.login_name) as mobile, invest_referrer_reward.referrer_login_name as referrer, invest_referrer_reward.amount as amount from invest_referrer_reward join invest on invest_referrer_reward.invest_id = invest.id where invest.loan_id = #{loanId} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS' and invest.transfer_status != 'SUCCESS' and invest_referrer_reward.status = 'SUCCESS'

select coupon.coupon_type as type, coupon.amount as amount, coupon.rate as rate from user_coupon join coupon on user_coupon.coupon_id = coupon.id where user_coupon.login_name = #{loginName} and user_coupon.status != 'SUCCESS' and datediff(user_coupon.end_time, now()) = 5
select id, name, login_name from transfer_application where invest_id = #{investId} and status = 'SUCCESS'

select count(1) > 0 from user_membership join membership on user_membership.membership_id = membership.id where user_membership.login_name = #{loginName} and user_membership.type = 'PURCHASED' and membership.level = 5 and now() > user_membership.expired_time and not exists (select 1 from user_message join message on user_message.message_id = message.id and user_message.login_name = #{loginName} and message.event_type = 'MEMBERSHIP_EXPIRED' where user_message.created_time > user_membership.expired_time)
select period from loan_repay where id = #{id}
select id, login_name as loginName from invest where loan_id = #{loanId}
select repay_amount as amount from invest_repay where invest_id = #{investId} and period = #{period}
select login_name from account where (if(length(identity_number) = 18, substring(identity_number,11,4), substring(identity_number,9,4))) = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m%d')
select level from membership where id = #{id}
select login_name from aa.transfer_application where id = #{id}

select user_coupon.login_name as login_name, coupon.coupon_type as type, coupon.amount as amount, coupon.rate as rate, user_coupon.start_time as start_time, user_coupon.end_time as end_time from user_coupon join coupon on user_coupon.coupon_id = coupon.id where user_coupon.id = #{userCouponId}
